name: Twin Thrust Lander
description: This project is created for the UGJ with my friend Samy on the music, The theme of 2 is in the controls and the cameras with one on the player and the other as a mini map the player will use both hands to control the rotation and thrust movement of the lander with the WASD and arrow keys together. Land it carefully on the platforms and gain a fuel boost and then return to the space platform for a refuel.
